changeSet.author: mdubrovin
changeSet.comment: Create privacystandard table for a case file
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `casefile_privacystandard` ( `casefile_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `standard` varchar(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`casefile_id`, `standard`), CONSTRAINT `FK_cf_ps_casefile_id` FOREIGN KEY (`casefile_id`) REFERENCES `casefile` (`id`));
